document.full_text: pele, bobby charlton and former brazil captain cafu will join the fifa task force which look at ways of brightening up the game and improve refereeing in time for the 2014 world cup.
document.title: pele, charlton and cafu join fifa's task force
lines_and_colors: pele, bobby charlton and former brazil captain cafu will join the fifa task force which look at ways of brightening up the game and improve refereeing in time for the 2014 world cup.
